mean_cn: n. 移民；侨民；  adj. 移民的；迁入的
mean_en: a person who comes to live in a country that is not their own
word_etyma: im向内，进入+migr迁移+ant表示人;形容词 → 外来的移民;移入国内的
short_phrase: an immigrant in a new country
sentence: The immigrants have left their home country to start a new life.
sentence_trans: 移民者离开他们原来的国家，开始了一段崭新的生活。
